item.tcc.soldier_basic_tag.desc: A symbol of basic combat skills, providing enhanced base damage
item.tcc.soldier_basic_tag.effect: Provides 50% bonus to all gun base damage
item.tcc.soldier_specific_tag.desc: Specialized training for specific weapon types
item.tcc.soldier_specific_tag.effect: Provides 50% bonus to specific gun damage (Sniper)
item.tcc.heavy_caliber_tag.desc: Converts attack power into more powerful gun damage multiplier
item.tcc.heavy_caliber_tag.effect: Converts 10% attack power to gun damage multiplier, but increases gun weight by 150%
item.tcc.red_movement_tag.desc: Perfect combination of rapid movement and precise shooting
item.tcc.red_movement_tag.effect: Provides 50% movement speed bonus while holding guns
item.tcc.ural_wolf_tag.desc: Precise and deadly strikes, showcasing hunter's instinct
item.tcc.heaven_fire_judgment.desc: I will launch an awesome attack
item.tcc.heaven_fire_judgment.effect: Uses 50% of current health as multiplier to boost general damage, deducts 50% current health after dealing damage
item.tcc.heaven_fire_apocalypse.effect: Uses 100% of current health as multiplier to boost general damage, explosion range and explosion damage, deducts 100% current health after dealing damage
item.tcc.despicable_acceleration.effect: Increases 90% firing speed, reduces 15% general damage and all specific gun damage
item.tcc.merged_rifling.effect: Increases 155% general damage and 25% movement speed while holding guns
item.tcc.careful_heart: I'm Careful Heart, Not a Fish
item.tcc.careful_heart.effect: Increases 300% launcher damage, 300% explosion damage, and 300% explosion radius
